name: Akkhor
description: A React Native app for Akkhor. Akkhor is a social media app for the Bangladeshi community. It is a platform for the Bangladeshi SSC & HSC student to take mock quiz exam and get their result. It is also a platform for the Bangladeshi community to share their thoughts, ideas, and knowledge.
